mapper.select: select * from favoriteTheater f inner join theater t on f.theaterIdx = t.theaterIdx where userIdx=#{w}

SELECT r.reservationIdx, r.theaterIdx, r.screenIdx, r.timetableIdx, r.reservationDate,r.customReservationIdx ,m.movieTitle, m.moviePosterUrl, h.theaterName, s.screenName, t.timetableStartTime, p.paymentFinal FROM reservation r INNER JOIN timetable t ON r.timetableIdx = t.timetableIdx INNER JOIN movie m ON t.movieIdx = m.movieIdx inner join theater h on r.theaterIdx = h.theaterIdx inner join screen s on r.screenIdx=s.screenIdx inner join payment p on r.reservationIdx = p.reservationIdx WHERE r.userIdx = #{idx} AND r.reservationStatus = 1 ORDER BY reservationIdx DESC;
SELECT t.theaterName FROM favoriteTheater f INNER JOIN theater t ON f.theaterIdx = t.theaterIdx WHERE f.userIdx = #{s}

SELECT r.reservationIdx, r.theaterIdx, r.screenIdx, r.timetableIdx, r.reservationDate,r.customReservationIdx ,m.movieTitle, m.moviePosterUrl, h.theaterName, s.screenName, t.timetableStartTime, p.paymentFinal FROM reservation r INNER JOIN timetable t ON r.timetableIdx = t.timetableIdx INNER JOIN movie m ON t.movieIdx = m.movieIdx inner join theater h on r.theaterIdx = h.theaterIdx inner join screen s on r.screenIdx=s.screenIdx inner join payment p on r.reservationIdx = p.reservationIdx WHERE r.userIdx = #{idx} AND r.reservationStatus = 0 ORDER BY reservationIdx DESC;
SELECT SUM(pointValue) AS totalPoints FROM point WHERE userIdx = #{idx} AND YEAR(pointDate) = YEAR(CURDATE()) and pointStatus=0 AND pointValue > 0
